Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
As a follow-up to our "2014 U.S. Retail Apps Report" that you recently downloaded, I wanted to send you this presentation about how mobile has changed the consumer decision journey. Stay tuned for more great content from Pivotal Labs!
Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
The Mobile Retail Landscape <http://www.slideshare.net/PivotalLabs/pl-mobile-retaillandscape-29159411>
With smartphones and tablets an essential part of peoples' lives, consumers no longer follow a straight path to purchase. Because they turn to their phones as a resource at each stage of their decision journey, mobile represents the ideal way for retailers to communicate with customers anytime, anywhere. Find out how mobile has changed the consumer decision journey, and how you can take advantage of it.
Get the presentation now <http://www.slideshare.net/PivotalLabs/pl-mobile-retaillandscape-29159411>.
